"I wish I had used scissors to cut my hair into a new style instead of waiting until it grew out."
"I regret not using scissors to trim the excess fabric off my pants before I went to the party."
"I wish I had used scissors to cut off the extra buttons on my shirt before I wore it to work."
"I regret not using scissors to cut off the excess rubber bands on my backpack before I went on my hike."
"I wish I had used scissors to cut off the extra stickers on my laptop before I took it to the repair shop."
